          <title>
            <string language="en">Analogy to current flow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analogie zum aktuellen Fluß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Analogie à l'écoulement actuel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Analogia ao fluxo atual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Analogia a flusso corrente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλογία στην παρούσα ροή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Analogía al flujo actual</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an analogy to the flow of current in a circuit using water flowing around a system of pipes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paddle wheel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pump</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Analogie zum Fluß des
Stromes in einem Stromkreis mit dem Wasser, das um ein System der 
Rohre fließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une analogie à 
l'écoulement du courant dans un circuit en utilisant l'eau coulant 
autour d'un système des pipes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma analogia ao fluxo da
corrente em um circuito usando a água que flui em torno de um sistema
das tubulações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un'analogia al flusso
della corrente in un circuito usando l'acqua che fluisce intorno ad un
sistema dei tubi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια αναλογία στη ροή του 
ρεύματος σε ένα κύκλωμα χρησιμοποιώντας το ύδωρ που ρέει γύρω 
από ένα σύστημα των σωλήνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una analogía al flujo 
de la corriente en un circuito usando el agua que fluye alrededor de 
un sistema de tubos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Stromkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paddelrad</string>
